thread.title: Games with Gold October 2015 Brings The Walking Dead Season 1
thread.title_full: Games with Gold October 2015 Brings The Walking Dead Season 1 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Games with Gold October 2015 Brings The Walking Dead Season 1
text: Microsoft has just confirmed the lineup of free titles coming to Xbox Live Gold members via the Games with Gold program in October of 2015. They include The Walking Dead Season 1 on both Xbox One and Xbox 360, as well as Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes and others. The Games with Gold program has slowly but surely evolved into a great experience for those who have Xbox Live Gold memberships on both the Xbox One and the Xbox 360 platforms.
